Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'm feeling experimental. I think I'll try to
make a meat and rice bowl using <clr:0000>multiple
kinds of meat<clr:ffff>.
Rumors say there's an <clr:0000>unknown creature<clr:ffff>
kicking around. I hear that and I wonder,
how is it going to taste on rice?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I can't believe I wanted to cook those
poor, sweet creatures lovingly raised by
the princess herself.
The only thing I deserve to eat is a big,
flaky slice of humble pie with a side of
shame soup.<sp:0:4:0>...You better not speak one word of this to
the princess! Got it?
Talk_0007: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Can this wait? <sp:5:1:0>I need to get under a roof.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Gotta sleep well so I wake up good and
hungry! That's the secret to happy eating!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Foodstuff and poison... <sp:5:0:0>Wow, who knew
cooking could be so deep?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'm feeling experimental. I think I'll try to
make a meat and rice bowl using <clr:0000>multiple
kinds of meat<clr:ffff>.
As for what kinds, hm... There's talk lately
of a <clr:0000>new creature I've never seen before<clr:ffff>.
A traveler from the <clr:0000>south <clr:ffff>told me about it.
Is it an animal? A monster? I couldn't
tell you. All I know is, I want to find out
how that thing tastes!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You mean the rumors are true? <sp:5:1:0>Princess
Zelda discovered these...<sp:5:0:0>Dondons, you
called them, and raised them herself?
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was going to cook an animal the princess
loved in the recipe she taught me.
How horrifying.<sp:0:4:0>All along, the real animal <sp:5:0:0>was me.
I'm the one who deserves to be cooked
and served on rice.
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>...Don't tell anyone about this! <sp:5:1:0>Got it?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We meet again!<sp:0:4:0>What? I'd never forget the guy who saved
my life.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That experience taught me a valuable
lesson about the all-too-thin line between
foodstuff and poison.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want to add some freaky flavors to
your cooking, I suggest sprinkling in some
<clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>.
You can buy it from <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>. That's
in the Akkala region in the northeastern
part of Hyrule.
